member_organisations:
IAB Europe has both corporate membership and national organisation membership. For a full list, please visit our website's member directory:  
http://www.iabeurope.eu/membership/member-directory/  
 
National organisations: IAB Austria, IAB France, IAB UK, BVDW, IAB Belgium, IAB Spain, IAB Italy, IAB Netherlands, IAB Romania, IAB Bulgaria, INAMA, INMA, SPIR, IAB Poland, IAB Hungary, IAB Belrus, IAB Russia, IAB turkey, IAB Switzerland, IAB Serbia, Danske Medier, IAB Finland, IAB Sweden, IAB Greece, IAB Slovakia, IAB Slovenia, IAB Portugal.
fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Culture and media, Trade, Consumers, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Digital economy and society, Borders and Security, Communication

section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
source: Participation via a consortium in the TYPES project (Horizon 2020)

relevant_communication: Outreach to the EU institutions on policy priorities, meetings of policy experts from our membership, drafting of analyses and position papers, public workshops and conferences on policy priorities, guidance to members on compliance.
goals__remit: Established in 1998, IAB Europe exists to support and promote the growth of the European online and interactive marketing industry. Representing 30 National IABs and Partners across Europe and over 5,500 companies, IAB Europe is the trade association of the European digital and interactive marketing industry.
